itemDisplayName: SIOS DataKeeper with SQL 2014 and Windows Failover Cluster
description: Creates four Windows Server 2012R2 nodes connected via a private vNet, and reachable via RDP. Two nodes host the SIOS DataKeeper high-availability / data replication solution as well as an evaluation version of MSSQL 2014. The other two are configured as a primary domain controller and separate client VM.
summary: This template porvides a quick and easy way to test the SIOS DataKeeper replication solution in conjunction with Microsoft's Windows Failover Cluster and SQL 2014 products. It can also be used as a foundation for a permanent solution if desired.
